question:
Which of the following statements are correct about Taj Mahal at Agra?
1. It is the most splendid monument of Shah Jahans reign.
2. It is one of the Seven Wonders of the World and its design is more Persian than Indian.
3. It was built by Shah Jahan in pure white marble on the banks of the Yamuna in the memory of his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Taj Mahal is the most splendid monument of Shah Jahans reign. It is one of the Seven Wonders of the World and its design is more Persian than Indian. It was built by Shah Jahan in pure white marble on the banks of the Yamuna in the memory of his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal.
